text: Encounter is the third studio album by Australian singer-songwriter Mark Holden. The album was released in September 1977 and peaked at number 40 on The Australian charts where it was certified gold for more the 50,000 copies. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (1977/78) !Peak position |- |Australian Albums (Kent Music Report) |align="center"|40 |} ==References== Category:Mark Holden albums Category:1977 albums Category:EMI Records albums Category:Pop albums by Australian artists
title: Encounter (Mark Holden album)
